text: William Patrick "Billy" Corgan, Jr. (born March 17, 1967) is an American singer and musician. He is the singer and guitarist for the American band The Smashing Pumpkins. Corgan and James Iha formed the band in 1988. == Related pages == *List of poets from the United States ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American bloggers Category:American guitarists Category:American rock musicians Category:Musicians from Illinois Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Singers from Illinois Category:The Smashing Pumpkins Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling executives
title: Billy Corgan
